name:
YO-KAI WATCH™ 3:
Update
description:
An update for "YO-KAI WATCH™ 3" is now available from Nintendo eShop.
All customers who own a copy of “YO-KAI WATCH™ 3” should download the update.
This will update the software to Version 1.2 with the following amendments:


- Various bugs have been fixed in
order to provide a smoother gaming
experience.


• Once the update has been
downloaded, it will be installed
automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience
caused, and recommend downloading
this update to ensure a smooth game
experience.
